name: A Better Place (clemna)
description:
DESCRIPTION:

Aamon is a little demon from hell who dreams of ascending to earth. Help him escape by navigating him through the dangers on his way. In this Jump 'n' Run, test your skills in order to fulfill his dream!

"A Better Place" is a semester project produced by 6 students from the Games Academy in 28 days. It is free, so make sure you grab it!

CONTROLS:

Move Left:       "A" or left arrow

Move right:     "D" or right arrow

Jump:      Spacebar

Dash:      Left Shift

Pause Menu:     "Esc"

SPECS:

Genre:    Platformer, Jump 'n' Run

Engine:    Unity

Camera perspective:    2D

Art style:    Dark and cute, cartoonish

Platform:    PC

Controls:    Keyboard & Mouse
